20101207193631.000|20101207193633.000|CCO|WILL HELP ECONOMIC GROWTH AND 
20101207193633.000|20101207193635.000|CCO|THIS WILL HELP JOB GROWTH OVER 
20101207193635.000|20101207193637.000|CCO|THE NEXT SEVERAL MONTHS.
20101207193637.000|20101207193639.000|CCO|THAT IS THE MAIN CRITERIA BY 
20101207193639.000|20101207193641.000|CCO|WHICH I MADE THIS DECISION.
20101207193641.000|20101207193643.500|CCO|THIS IS SOMETHING THAT I THINK 
20101207193643.500|20101207193646.000|CCO|EVERYBODY HAS TO REMEMBER.
20101207193646.000|20101207193648.500|CCO|AND I WOULD SPEAK ESPECIALLY TO 
20101207193648.500|20101207193651.000|CCO|MY FELLOW DEMOCRATS WHO I THINK 
20101207193651.000|20101207193652.667|CCO|RIGHTLY ARE PASSIONATE ABOUT 
20101207193652.667|20101207193654.333|CCO|MIDDLE CLASS FAMILIES WORKING 
20101207193654.333|20101207193656.000|CCO|CLASS FAMILIES, LOW-INCOME 
20101207193656.000|20101207193657.667|CCO|FAMILIES HAVING THE TOUGHEST 
20101207193657.667|20101207193659.333|CCO|TIME IN THE ECONOMY.
20101207193659.333|20101207193701.000|CCO|THE SINGLE MOST IMPORTANT JOBS 
20101207193701.000|20101207193702.667|CCO|PROGRAM WE CAN PUT IN PLACE IS A
20101207193702.667|20101207193704.333|CCO|GROWING ECONOMY.
20101207193704.333|20101207193706.000|CCO|THE SINGLE MOST IMPORTANT ANTI 
20101207193706.000|20101207193707.667|CCO|POVERTY PROGRAM WE CAN PUT IN 
20101207193707.667|20101207193709.333|CCO|PLACE IS MAKING SURE FOLKS HAVE 
20101207193709.333|20101207193711.000|CCO|JOBS AND THE ECONOMY IS GROWING.
20101207193711.000|20101207193713.500|CCO|IF THE ECONOMY IS NOT GROWING,

20101207193716.000|20101207193718.500|CCO|HIRING FASTER THAN IT'S 
20101207193718.500|20101207193721.000|CCO|CURRENTLY HIRING THEN WE'LL

20101207193727.000|20101207193729.000|CCO|WHEN I LOOKED AT WHAT OUR

20101207193757.667|20101207193801.000|CCO|>> THE UNEMPLOYMENT RATE WAS 
20101207193801.000|20101207193802.667|CCO|NORTH OF 18% WHEN THE LAST
